derivation: probably from H3201 (יָכֹל) (in the sense of capacity);
outline:
1. palace, temple, nave, sanctuary
    1. palace
    2. temple (palace of God as king)
    3. hall, nave (of Ezekiel's temple)
    4. temple (of heavenly temple)
strongs_def: a large public building, such as a palace or temple
